LanguageData.VFES_Turret_AutocannonDouble.label: double autocannon
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_AutocannonDouble.description: A heavy automatic turret enhanced with 2 barrels. Its large-caliber shells do heavy damage over significant ranges, but its barrels must be refurbished after use. It cannot fire at close-up targets, and may explode when damaged.
LanguageData.VFES_TurretDoubleAutocannon_Top.label: double autocannon
LanguageData.VFES_TurretDoubleAutocannon_Top.descript: A self-loading large-bore double cannon designed to be attached to a turret.
